overview: Mr. Jeff Bisberg has 25 years of experience in developing and marketing innovative solid-state technologies, focused on light-emitting technologies, including developing novel organic light emitting diodes (LEDs), LED print-heads, and an award winning laser printing system. Mr. Bisberg has over 20 published papers, patents, and standards in the field of electro-optics. Mr. Bisberg received his Masters in Materials Science and Engineering from Northwestern University.
